name: eulerid
body: |- wceq(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, cpi)), caddc, nat1), nat0)

stmt.origin: eqtri(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, cpi)), caddc, nat1), nat0, co(cneg(nat1), caddc, nat1))
